actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XLIV of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require complete financial disclosure respecting spouses and dependent children of persons filing reports under such rule and to require that Members who provide professional services to clients disclose the names and charges respecting each client.

summary.text: Amends rule XLIV of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require complete financial disclosure with respect to spouses and dependent children of persons required to file reports under the rule. Requires any Member who has outside earned income, derived from professional fees from clients, to disclose the names of and aggregate fees received from each such client.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XLIV of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require complete financial disclosure respecting spouses and dependent children of persons filing reports under such rule and to require that Members who provide professional services to clients disclose the names and charges respecting each client.
